cellularAutomata.reflection
Class CAClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      cellularAutomata.reflection.CAClassLoader

public class CAClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

Loads CA classes and in particular, loads classes that are in the userAnalyses and userRules folder. First delegates to the default class loader, then if that doesn't work, it uses the methods below.

Uses the singleton design pattern to ensure that there is only one class loader. If there are multiple class loaders, then loading the same exact file will create two classes of entirely different types. For example, static variables will not be static across what should have been instances of the same class. And class casting exceptions can occur. For example, "TheClass class1 = (TheClass) class2;" will fail even though class1 and class2 were loaded from the exact same ".class" file. It fails because each class loader will believe that it has loaded a different class.

Author:
David Bahr
